t: Amazon wins trademark case in boost for online retailers vs luxury firms | Reuters
s: April 2, 2020 - BRUSSELS (Reuters) - Amazon is not liable for unknowingly stocking goods for third-party sellers that infringe trademarks, Europe's top court said on Thursday, handing online retailers a victory in their battle against luxury goods companies. t: Coty | COTY Stock Price, Company Overview & News
s: Coty, Inc. manufactures and markets beauty products, fragrances, color cosmetics and skin care products. The company operates in three segments: Fragrances, Color Cosmetics and Skin & Body Care. The Fragrances segment provides a variety of men's and women's products.
